TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_South_Africa, title = South_Africa, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Africa} }

S.FORM: = South Africa = Gaga kska Meycow ka South africa, 29 00 S, 24 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 1,219,090 sq km(hangan na o Tg25) (knlbanga dxgal o 1,214,470 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 4,620 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 54,300,704 hiyi. Gaga Pretoria ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 27 idas 4 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal South africa ga wada sugan 79.40% ka dxgal qpahan, 7.60% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 13% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Jacob Zuma, pnaah hngkawas2009 idas 5 jiyax 9pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Tuhunac Afrika = Tuhunac Afrika Konghkwo (Kari Tuhunac Afrika: Republiek van Suid-Afrika (rɛpɵ'blik fan səit'afrikɑː), kari Ingkoku: Republic of South Africa),splawa dha Tuhunac Afrika (kari Tuhunac Afrika: Suid-Afrika (səit'afrikɑː), kari Ingkoku: South Africa), wa mniq Afrika tuhunac balay, tuhunac u pnstrngan Tasiyang mi tuhunac Ucilung India na konghkwo. Knbeyhing tndxral Tuhunac Afrika pa hmrinas 122 knbkiyan pinghwang km,knbeyhing dxral mi knhbrawan hiyi sediq u tnbkuwan tu24 knkana qnlangan, quri so 'Qnlhangan Kcka Qnlhangan' Lesotho (1,106km knbbaraw ka ayus) mniq kcka dxral Tuhunac Afrika daw wada mkingal Kcka Mskaya Dxral. Ri-s Pusu tyawmu: Rikisi Tuhunac Afrika. Mcbiyaw balay sucyeyn kawkuswey Tuhunac Afrika u niqan duma qnlangan babaw dxral knrudan balay kawku mi hwasu ssdiq hniti tuqar cbiyaw balay. Kawku sweycya u wada kndadax Hawtng Sng kcka knkingal bling sndiyal smku knou bay hwasu mi buc ssdiq cbiyaw. Pnsliyan Cyawkwen UN u wada dha ngalan Jaysang Hniti Qnlangan Tuhunac Afrika uri, splawa 'Pusu Pnyahan Ssediq'. Kngkawas 1924, Raymond Dart u mniq Tuiwil Daya Sng kingal alang Taung sndiyal tu1 hwasu ssediq- Laqi Taung. Ya bay kndadax brah kongweyn 500 kngkawas cida, sediq San mniq Afrika tuhunac phiyu knkana umaduk lmamu mi spuda qqpahan tmabu tnbuwan ka pusu uuda keyjay. Dsediq San niyi so ka sediq mptabu tnbuwan niya pa splawa dha 'Sediq Khoikhoi' (Dungus niya u 'Ssediq'), kiya u kcka tnpusu mniq tndxral hiya u splawa dha 'Sediq Bushmen' (Dungus niya ka 'Sediq Lmiqu'). Spuda qnbsyaqan bay msturung mi pnspuwan dara daw, ddha minjoku niyi u wada msediq Khoisan. Konghkwo Kngkkawas 1960 prading, duma qnlhangan u prading tbrinah ini sruwa pnwaya psanak minjoku Tuhunac Afrika, binaw alaw muda pnwaya psanak mnjoku ka Tuhunac Afrika, kiya ka mnuda 'Snklwiyan Pnskraya Keyjay'. Kiya u mniq kngkkawas 1960 dhuq kngkkawas 1970 jiday, malu muda pnsung qnlangan cida wada ini biyaw mrana na Nihong, wada dha splawa sa 'Knbeyhing Sediq Keyjay Afrika'. Dhuq kngkkawas 1980 jiday, knbeyhing balay hmtur uuda u beytaq pkrana dhiq Pchuwan Kwoci mi wada malax tocu ka qnlhangan icil, kiya ka wada dndulan ka keyjay Tuhunac Afrika. Mangosuthu Gatsha Buthelezi mi Hari Schwarz mniq kngkawas 1974 pbatas pnsdhuwan "Pnkla Kari Snhiyan Mahrabatini", snbeyhing quri psblayaq rinji muda biyax mi mntna kana ka txtaxa sediq ka pusu niya, kiya Tuhunac Afrika mpdudul dha qalux sediq mi bhuway sediq muwaya bay tumn1 wada mnhdu pbatas quri pnsdhuwan niyi. Kngkawas 1989 cida Frederik Willem de Klerk ka psdhuwan phiyu soto qnlhangan, wada plaxan ka pnwaya psanak minjoku kiya mi pdudul dukurici ka Tuiwil hunac Afrika. Kngkawas 1990 idas 2 diyax 9, Namibia u wada pbatas psdhu keyngpo dha mi snpeyyah qnlhangan Tuhunac Afrika dukuricu. Mntna kngkawas cida, wada pkla kari ka Tuhunac Afrika sliqun dha ka howuku dha, kiya mi tumal "Patas PnsdhuwanUxay Pkrana Howuci". Kngkawas 1994 idas 3 diyax 1, Tuhunac Afrika u wada dha subway Namibia ka Ppanan Asu Walvis mi Penguin Cyuntaw. Idas 4, Tuhunac Afrika u muwaya bay mntxan muda Ini psanak minjoku seyngkyo, uxay wana niyi, Tuhunac Afrika u wada snburah tumal Ta Ing kwoswey Dungan, kiya mi wada mtumal mnTuhunac Afrika Pkrana Kongtongti. Ti-ri Pusu tyawmu: Lnlingay dxral Tuhunac Afrika. Juga dxral u pntura Tuhunac Afrika pusu balay nniqan lnlingay dxral dha. Mqalux kndux seyng ka kndadax pnspuwan Tubeyhing Doras tukcka tubaraw brnux tnayus, Tubeyhing Doras tubaraw dudux balay u dhuq hmrinas 3,000m. Tunarac mbanah seyng ka Tudu Dwiyaq Drakensberg,tudu dwiyaq niyi u kiya ka wada mtnayus Kwa Zulu-Natal Sng mi Lesotho. Uxay wana katu doras mi tudu ddwiyaq ka wada ptura bay tnayus, msngari mlngu bnatas ka dxral pa uka mndungus bay pnsnakan ayus. Kcka duma klaun dxral u niqan rncuhan rakaw, duma dxral u wana spuda hangan dha muda pkla. Tuhunac Afrika u wa mniq tuhunac hungun balay Afrika, mkngahu ucilung seyng u muru tuhunac Tasiyang mi tuhunac Ucilung India lmutuc hmrinas 2,500km, kiya mi dxral qnlhangan u dhuq 1,219,912 pinghwang km. Spuda "Patas Kngkawas Knhbrawan Hiyi Sediq UN", tnbkuwan qnlangan tu24 knbeyhing qnlhangan ka Tuhunac Afrika. Kngkarac Tuhunac Afrika u Mtilux Sspriq Brnux Kngkarac ka pusu. Tasiyang mi Ucilung India psanak kndadax tunarac, tuhunac, tuiwil tu3 pnyahan mtqiri Tuhunac Afrika, hniqan dxral u tudaya ka baraw mi tuhunac ka truma, kngkarac u kndadax tuiwil daya ka Nanobi Bnaqi Bbuyu, tuhunac ka Mtilux Balay Kndnguwan Dmka Kndnguwan Kngkarac dhuq tunarac ka Mtilux Hari Kngkarac. Misan u mniq kawas kawas idas 6 dhuq idas 8. Sngwu Twoyangsing. Tuhunac Afrika mniq kngkawas 1994 idas 6 diyax 4 pbatas pnsdhuwan "Pnsdhuwan Sngwu twoyangsing", wada pwaya mndungus patas pnsdhuwan Qnlhangan Sngwu Twoyangsing Canrwey mi Singtong Keykaku. Mniq qnlangan u 17 ka kcka Cawci Sngwu Twoyangsing Qnlhangan Tongmong, tnbkuwan tu6 ka Tuhunac Afrika. Ccamac Kiya ka knkana rayung Transva, lqlic Afrika, lqlic Tuhunac Afrika, bhuway sinyo tuhunac, dapa dmay tukarac urung, miric nyeyncyaw, miric heypan, huling bbuyu, homa, kiya mi bbaraw waru rqnux Tuhunac Afrika uri mi ou bay punuh ccamac u malu qtan mniq kcka kwanmucong spriq. Kiya mi Tuhunac Afrika u niqan ou bay tukubeycu kluwan ccamac lmiqu, kcka u kiya ka knkana mniq nniqan Karoo uxay biyaw mpuka ka osagey Tuhunac Afrika. Cyunrey Dhuq kngkawas 1945, Tuhunac Afrika u wada hmrinas 4,900 kluwan bntasan ka cncyun (kiya ka knkana wada mnLukus Dxral na kluwan uri). Kngkawas 2006 cida, Tuhunac Afrika u ya bay niqan 20 knbkiyan cncyun (ini spuwi ka mnsdan mudus kuwi niya); spuda snpuwan dha matas, knou cncyun Tuhunac Afrika u rmabang knou qqhuni mi pphpah. Qqhuni mi pphpah Qqhuni mi pphpah twoyangsing Tuhunac Afrika u kari bay mi mndungus balay, niqan hmrinas 22,000 kluwanan ini pntna kawtng qqhuni mi pphpah, kiya ka kana qnlangan knklan kluwanan qqhuni mi pphpah ya bay 9%. Qtan bay sngwu cyunrwo ka sspriq brnux, kcka hini pusu bay u niqan rcya king hohwan mi qhuni paycu. Quri so pawyu Mniq cuxal 40 kngkawas, wada uka ka knbeyhing bay dxral cisi ida nkiya Tuhunac Afrika, pusu balay ka 19 th cida scuqi hbaraw ka sediq, mrana ka alang mkbrnux mi kmuruc qhuni lmiqu. Kiya uri u niqan ou bay ka kluwanan pneyyah qnlhangan icil (Mray so qhuni qalux cing, maingta kiya mi phpah tukarac ing) quri so tndxral sngwu twoyangsing u wada knbeyhing bay snrdingan niya. Cng-c mi Cng-fu Pusu tyawmu: Seyhu Tuhunac Afrika, seyji Tuhunac Afrika, horicu Tuhunac Afrika mi biyax sediq Thunac Afrika. Pnsliyan Seyhu Tuhunac Afrika ka Gikay Konghkwo, binaw tuhuy quri so konghkwo niyi u ini pntna, soto ka qnlhangan weynso mi pusu tunux mpdudul seyhu uri. Diyax iyax qpahun soto u 5 kngkawas, malu mn2 mangal qpahun soto. Soto u malu dmurun phiyu huku soto mi knkingal bu bbucyo, kiya mi bucyo mi knkingal dnudul niya pumn ka muda pssli Neyko. Kokomin Gikay u malu muda ini snhiyi tongyi muda tanho soto mi neyko. Singcng, phiyu waya mi suhwa u to bay sqlhangan mdakar keyngpo kana, nasi smliq waya keyngpo, sangci hoing u niqan biyax hmtur singcng cikwan mi ndan gikay. Horicu Soweto u pskoraw kngkawas 2012 tumal na sediq u kangyi smquri ptuluk qridin tongsingryeynco. Tuhunac Afrika u niqan mdhu bay qmlahang waya biyax sediq, binaw ida niqan duma cyunti ka thqilan dha mita. Tuhunac Afrika ka Afrika tu1 smruwa tongsing msturung niya qnlhangan. "Keyngpo Tuhunac Afrika" ka Tuhunac Afrika tubaraw bay horicu, waya niyi ka nniqan konghkwo pndungus lxanan horicu, pwaya biyax mi qpahun kongmin, kiya mi muda mku psanak ddaun seyhu. Pnluban waycyaw Kngkawas 1948 dhuq kngkawas 1990 jiday prading, bhuway seyhu Tuhunac Afrika u muda pnwaya psanak minjoku, so kiya wada danan hmtur mi sthiyaq balay syakay qnlangan. Cida, wada balay so tnqliyan murux nanaq ka hnyuwan niya qnlangan, wana duma dxral qnlhangan tudaya bhuway seduq cngcweyn ka niqan pnluban dha. Kngkawas 1998 idas 1 diyax 1, Tuhunac Afrika u wada pstuq pnluban waycyaw Cyoka Minkoku, kiya mi mndungus bay phiyu pnluban waycyaw Cyoka Jnmin Konghkwo, kiya ka thiti bay tuhuy Cyoka Monkoku pstuq waycyaw na pusu pangcyaw qnlhangan. Ana so kiya,Tuhunac Afrika u ida mniq Taiwan phiyu dayhyocu, kiya ka ini khbaraw tuhuy Cyoka Minkoku pwaluk malu pnluban uxay seyhu wacyaw pnluban na qnlhangan Afrika uri. Singcng cyuhwa Cing-ci Pusu tyawmu: Keyjay Tuhunac Afrika. Tuhunac Afrika u muda prrimax keyjay, kiya ka psnul Nigeria na tu2 keyjayti Afrika, binaw balay bay pa quri so smnalu dha lxanan u knmalu balay pnkrana niya. Pspun pnsung qnlhangan icil, Tuhunac Afrika jncyun kcka qnlhangan sngcan mawo u tubaraw bay uri, binaw knbeyhing bay snthyaqan uri ka sediq snblayaq mi sediq mqraqil. Ana so wada mnhdu ka pnwaya pnsanak minjoku, binaw Tuhunac Afrika saya u ida snturung tubaraw bay mqrinuc ryu mi uka qpahun ryu. Quri Keyjay dha. Ini pntna qnlangan kayhwacong qnlhangan mi hbaraw bay qnlhangan Afrika ka Tuhunac Afrika, ini so kkrana ka uxay so mndungus bay keyjay ka Tuhunac Afrika.Kngkawas 1994, burah seyhu Tuhunac Afrika u mbiyax bay phlih tonghwo pongcang, sndhu kongkong caycng, kiya mi mhuc duma waycu, binaw knkrana keyjay u ida ini pndungus. Kndadax kngkawas 2004 prading, wada ptura bay mrana ka keyjay niya Tuhunac Afrika, kiya uri pa Tuhunac Afrika u kuxul balay yahan sdhmaun rmiwaw. Knkana nngalan dha pila u mabang ou bay ka pneyyah qqpahan rmiwaw, so kawas ka Tuhunac Afrika knrana ryu GDP ka 5.1%, kngkawas 2006 daw 5.0%. Tuhunac Afrika pa mnkcka baraw nngalan niya Kayhwacong Qnlhangan, kiya ka duma qnlhangan Afrika, pusu balay kwoci mawyi tumudaci dha pa Doicu, Amirika, Cyoka Jnmin Konghkwo, Nihong, Ingkoku mi Spain. Pnwaya dha ddiyun pila ka pila Tuhunac Afrika. Kngkawas 2013 idas 8, "fDi Cacu" u spuda Tuhunac Afrika mkbiyax keyjay, nniqan lnlingay mpqpah, ssliqun mi nngalan, lxanan smmlun, ddangi pluban qmpah mi waysang msdyrux tocu, kiya ka wada dha srngaw mndungus bay qnlhangan Afrika ka Tuhunac Afrika. Cinjong pawmi cusu u wada ptbkuwan knkana qnlangan tu50 knanjey bay qdriqan jeyking tnlangan baraw. Tu1 qqpahan pnyahan Mniq 18 th cida, Tuhunac Afrika u wada madas kluwanan Mirino na miric rudu ubal, kiya ka prading knou bay hnranan dha ubal miric. 20 th brah cida, keyjay Tuhunac Afrika u mnsntama balay qqpahan tmabu tnbuwan ka pusu balay han, pusu balay ka tmabu miric. Ubal miric cukocu Tuhunac Afrika u tu2, tnhiti quri king kwang. Alaw rngedi cucu ka miyah smliq, ini kou ka tmabu dapa, kiya uri u, pusu balay pnyahan nasi ro uri ka Tuhunac Afrika. Tu2 qqpahan pnyahan Qqpahan xxiluy ka rulu, kikay uri mchdil kongyey na lxanan niya. Mchdil kongyey Tuhunac Afrika ka smmalu kikay, tunux kisya, kikay nojyo, asu kiya mi ssalu rulu ka pusu niya. Tuhunac Afrika ka murux bay Afrika sntama biyax honeng phdeyngki na qnlhangan, wa mniq CapeTown phiyu Afrika Talu murux bay hotyeyncan. Tu3 qqpahan pnyahan Mniq quri qqpahan pnyahan, kndadax 1990 kngkawas pnrdingan, pusu balay dndulan mrana keyjay Tuhunac Afrika ka tu3 qqpahan pnyahan, tukubeycu niya u kiya ka qqpahan ginghang, qqpahan cingjong, qqpahan rrmiwaw mi qqpahan ppanan skoki, smquri so GDP u niqan knbeyhing bay qnepah niya, kcka na u, qqpahan huwu ka pusu tu3 qqpahan pnyahan Tuhunac Afrika, kiya ka knkana hmrinas Tuhunac Afrika GDP 67%. Lxanan smluwan mi ppanan sediq mi qqiya Mniq Tuhunac Afrika pa, ppanan sediq mi qqiya u kiya ka ddaun planun balay muda kiya, kiya ka muda pkrana MyCiTi niya pusu uri. MyCiTi ka 1 basu cyeyyun sitong, spuda smruwa mi ptrawah knslxan bay ppanan sitong miyah dmayaw uuda ppanan rulu Cape Town. Mniq kngkawas 2014, knkana qnlhangan Tuhunac Afrika knkingal sediq pnpanan skoki u hmrinas mn3,500 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, tnbkuwan mtbiyax bay ppanan skoki u Oliver Tambo Kwoci Ppanan Skoki, Cape Town Kwoci Ppanan Skoki, King Shaka Kwoci Ppanan Skoki, Elizabeth Trduwan Asu Ppanan Skoki mi Tuhnranan Didaw London Ppanan Skoki. Biyax rawtong sucang. Tuhunac Afrika na Dmayaw Qalux Sediq Cngco mi Mdhu Bay Muda Cngco u wada pkrana keyjay qnbliqan qalux sediq, kiya mi niqan ka kcka tnbarah qalux sediq congcan cyeyci uri. Kiya u knkana biyax dnuwi qnlhangan mi pddayak, quri so pnwaya mdakar rawkong u kiya ka wada krinah mrana ka uuda uka qpahun. Snburah Koyeyn. Duma pusu balay koswey mi cisu pkrana u snpeyyah Tuhunac Afrika kana: Kngkawas 1967 idas 12 diyax 3, spuda Grotschul byoing sinjyo wayko ising Christiaan Banard pa wada pndungus bay muda knkana qnlangan muwaya balay Muda Pkuruc Thdil Sinjyo; Max Theiler ka snmalu 1 Iyu Mdakar Mcayis Mitilux Narux; Allan Macleod Cormack ka snmalu X Seseyng Smpuci Twancng Sawmyaw; Aaron Klug ka snmalu Cintiswey Tyeyncu Syeynweycing cisu. Wana Banard ising ka uka, kana hangan baraw niyi pa mnangal Snadu Nobel kana, kiya ka wada pkrana knou bay mnangal Snadu Nobel na qnlhangan Afrika. Kngkawas 2002, Sydney Brenner pa alaw mniq quri so snmalu qpahun huncu sngwuswey kiya ka wada mangal Snadu Nobel. Pndungus qsiya mi weysng Tuhunac Afrika Quri Qsiya Pumn na 2 ptura tukubeycu ka mtrawah lxanan dmuwi qsiya cngco mi uri Qsiya Yingkay ka pniqan dha. Kngkawas 2014 idas 5, Delban u alaw 'Pyeynksing mi Pawjongsing Hoho' wada mangal Snadu Stockholm Kongyey Qsiya, kiya ka splawa dha 'Knkana Qnlangan Knklaman Bay Kongyong Qqpahan Uri' ka pumn niyi, kiya ka muwaya bay pquri sediq mqrinuc pndungus ini angal pila ddiyun lxanan qsiya niya Cucu Su. Jen-ko Pusu tyawmu: Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Tuhunac Afrika. Knhbrawan mi Bnkuwan Tuhunac Afrika ka 1 niqan ya bay 5,962 knbkiyan (Kngkawas 2020) snpeyyah ini pntna pnyahan, bungka, kari mi snlhayan snhiyan knhbrawan hiyi sediq na qnlhangan. Kndadax qnhduwan pnwaya psanak minjoku ka Tuhunac Afrika daw, duma bhuway sediq pa kndudul mlatac Tuhunac Afrika, kngkawas 1980 daw wada mlih dhuq 16%. Kari Tuhunac Afrika u niqan 11 kluwanan kari ddiyun seyhu. Spuda kngkawas 2011 snpuwan knhbrawan hiyi sediq, srngaw dha balay tu1 kari ka kari Zulu (22.7%), sprun bay snrnu pa kari Ingkoku u wana balay tnbkuwan tu4, binaw kari Ingkoku ka pusu balay kari srngaw dha quri mniq seyji, mniq mbbari mi cwanmey. Knou balay bhuway sediq Tuhunac Afrika u rmngaw kari O Co, kiya ka kari Budoya, kari Doicu mi kari Hellas, niqan duma llutuc Asia sediq Tuhunac Afrika u rmngaw kari Asia uri. Quri so mniq Tuhunac Afrika na Afrika France Cweyn Qnlhangan sediq tnhdilan pa rmngaw kari Afrika France kiya. Alang Mkbrnux Ini knbaka ka nniqan sapah mi ini ttuku kalxanan smnalu ka dxral nniqan alang mkbrnux pusu niya uuda uri. So kiya, alang mkbrnux ssiyaw dxral nniqan tukubeycu niya ka uxay mndungus bay smnalu ssapah, mray so beywi, nniqan mqrinuc sediq uri. Nniqan hbaraw qalux sediq na Alang Mkbrnux Hwa cincng mniq 21 th pnrdingan lmutuc, smatang knhbrawan sediq nongcwen u musa mlih 5% dhuq 10%. Snlhayan s Spuda kngkawas 2001 snpuwan knhbrawan Tuhunac Afrika, snlhayan Kiristo kyo ka knhbrawan hoyi sediq 79% Tuhunac Afrika, kcka niya u to bay snluhay Burah Kiristo kyo, ini khbaraw ka Teyns kyo mi duma kyokay. Bungka Pusu tyawmu: Bungka Tuhunac Afrika. Tuhunac Afrika qalux sediq pa to bay mpqpah pnwalang ka hbaraw bay, kiya mi ida wisu msmay bay mniq kcka mqrinuc alang mpqpah pnwalang, binaw nniqan dha hiya u kiya ka hmuruc mndungus bay pnsltudan bungka Tuhunac Afrika. Binaw, wada hbaraw bay qalux sediq u prading Alang Mkbrnux Hwa mi Tumuqi Hidaw Hwa, pnsltudan bungka niyi u wisu kndudul uka. Tuhunac Afrika Tongcyun ka Tuhunac Afrika muwaya bay pnquri knkana qnlhangan kana kluwan joku mbbiyax mi rudan sediq ptrawah 1 pssliyan mbbiyax uri. Yisu Tuhunac Afrika na yisupin pa kiya ka knkanna duma kncka qnlangan kncbiyaw bayyisupin, mniq brah kongweyn 10000 kngkawas, miyah thdil Tuhunac Afrika ka Sediq Khoi San u prading ndhiya nanaq tukubeycu bungka mi yisu- Juga Qnabil Bling Btasil. Meyti mi ryosing bungka. Tuhunac Afrika u niqan knbeyhing bay qqpahun cwanmey, kiya ka Afrika pusu balay cwanmey congsin uri. Pusu balay srngaw dha kari ka kari Ingkoku. Mmahan mu uuqan Damac mi mmahan mi uuqan bungka Tuhunac Afrika u to bay quri hiyi ka lxanan, sediq tndxral u splawa dha 'Braai (Dungus niya nduhan hiyi uxay daw muduh). Saya, kiya uri u Tuhunac Afrika saya u wada mkrana dhuq pusu balay pnyahan sinaw lipas qnlhangan uri, kiya mi niqan balay hnhangan knkana qnlangan. Tiyu Wa mbiyax Kngkawas 2007 Qnlhangan Pey Pnsung Boru Kandang daw, Miric Storing Tuy u tumal basu mraka rmiwaw. Kuxul balay mi sdhmaun balay tiyu undo Tuhunac Afrika ka mtur boru, boru kandang mi pancyo. Mnuda cupan mi wada mbiyax Ici bang Kngkawas 1995 Qnlangan Pey Pnsung Boru Kandang, kiya mi mniq France mbiyax Kngkawas 2007 Qnlangan Pey Pnsung Boru Kandang. So kawas u wada cupan Qnlhangan Afrika Pey, kiya mi qnlhangan tuy u wada mbiyax Dungan. Tuhunac Afrika mniq pnsung beyhing kwoci undokay dha na tnbkuwan: · Rbawan Olympic Undokay: 26King 31Ging 29Dong 86 ka snadu ( Tuhunac Afrika tu2, qnlangan tu32). · Misan Olympic Undokay: 0King 0Ging 0Dong 0 ka snadu ( Uka hnhangan). · Qnlangan Undokay: 6King 11Ging 18Dong 35 ka snadu ( Tuhunac Afrika tu2, qnlangan tu35. · Rbawan Tubeyhing Undokay: 27King 21Ging 28Dong 76 ka snadu ( Tuhunac Afrika tu1, qnlangan tu27). · Misan Tubeyhing Undokay: 0King 0Ging 0Dong 0 ka snadu ( Uka hnhangan). · Qnlangan Upo Undokay: 2King 1Ging 8Dong 11 ka snadu ( Tuhunac Afrika tu2, qnlangan tu26). · Rbawan Mbbiyax Olympic Undokay: 6King 5Ging 4Dong 15 ka snadu ( Tuhunac Afrika tu4, qnlangan tu27). · Misan Mbbiyax Olympic Undokay: 0King 0Ging 0Dong 0 ka snadu ( Uka hnhangan). Pnskraya Qnlhangan Diyax smsung sngayan節日 Tuburah balay smsung sngayan mi diyax kineyng knkana qnlhanga Tuhunac Afrika ka trahuc niyi: : Kyoiku Pusu tyawmu: Kyoiku Tuhunac Afrika. Tuhunac Afrika pa alaw mnqnlhangan Ingkoku, kiya ka mniq lxanan kyoiku ka Ingsu Kyoiku, kiya mi ririh sa mntna balay Ingkoku. Alaw Tuhunac Afrika u mnmuda pnwaya psanak minjoku cngco, cuxal balay ka qalux sediq pa uka brahan mangal biyax muda kyoiku, pyasan tubeyhing u to bay bhuway sediq kana ka pnhiyu niya, dhuq malax pnwaya psanak minjoku daw, qalux sediq u hana niqan pnsdkanan biyax muda kyoiku. Pqita narux weysng. Pusu tyawmu: Pqita narux weysng mi Pqita narux qmlahang hiyi. Spuda bnatas smpu Tuhunac Afrika Pnluban Minjoku Keykyoso, kngkawas 2009 bhuway sediq yuci knudus ka 71 kngkawas, kiya miqalux sediq ka 48 kngkawas. Wana 16% sediq Tuhunac Afrika ka ndwanan qmlahang Keykaku Pqita Narux, quri so msngari kana sediq daw kasi ka dmuwi pila dha nanaq uxay daw spuda byoing dmuwi pila keykaku muway. Tuhunac Afrika ka nniqan qnlangan tu3 knbeyhing byoing Chris Hani Baragwanath Byoing. Ssediq Tuhunac Afrika ka knkana qnlangan knou bay sediq runan Narux Aycu na qnlhangan. Spuda pnkla kari UN Narux Aycu Ryeynho Kuyhwasu, Tuhunac Afrika pa ya bay niqan 700 knbkiyan hiyi sediq runan Narux Aycu. Uuda Narux Aycu Tuhunac Afrika u hidoyi balay, mniq kngkawas 2013 cida u ya bay niqan 560 knbkiyan hiyi sediq (Hmrinas knkana hiyi sediq 10% Tuhunac Afrika) wada runan Narux Aycu. Brah soto Thabo Mvuyelwa Mbeki mi ngalan weysng bucyo ka Manto Tshabalala-Msimang ka bsiyaq balay hmtur kari uuda quri monday Tuhunac Afrika Narux Aycu, dhiya u mdhu bay kari dha pusu hnqilan dha u alaw ini pndungus eyyo mi mqrinuc ka kiya. Mniq babaw kngkawas 2009 tubeyhing seyngkyo daw, seyhu u prading pkrana pila pkrbangan nniqan muda pkmalu naru aycu. Dhuq kngkawas 2015 cida, seyhu u pndungus mhnuk thiyi iyu, kiya ka wada kndadax 52.1 kngkawas ka yuci knudus pkranan dhuq 62.5 kngkawas. Pnyahan pnatas CIA 外交部 Tnhjil kari seejiq Watan Diro mtabug.

= Sooth Africa = Gaga kska Meycow ka Sooth africa, 29 00 S, 24 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 1,219,090 sq km(hangan na o Tg25) (knlbanga dxgal o 1,214,470 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 4,620 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 54,300,704 hiyi. Gaga Pretoria ka poso alang paro, jiyax 27 idas 4 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Sooth africa ga wada sogan 79.40% ka dxgal qpahan, 7.60% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 13% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Jacob Zoma, pnaah hngkawas2009 idas 5 jiyax 9pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Tohonac Afrika = Tohonac Afrika Konghkwo (Kari Tohonac Afrika: Repobliek van Soid-Afrika (rɛpɵ'blik fan səit'afrikɑː), kari Ingkoko: Repoblic of Sooth Africa),splawa dha Tohonac Afrika (kari Tohonac Afrika: Soid-Afrika (səit'afrikɑː), kari Ingkoko: Sooth Africa), wa mniq Afrika tohonac balay, tohonac o pnstrngan Tasiyang mi tohonac Ucilong India na konghkwo. Knbeyhing tndxral Tohonac Afrika pa hmrinas 122 knbkiyan pinghwang km,knbeyhing dxral mi knhbrawan hiyi sediq o tnbkowan to24 knkana qnlangan, qori so 'Qnlhangan Kcka Qnlhangan' Lesotho (1,106km knbbaraw ka ayos) mniq kcka dxral Tohonac Afrika daw wada mkingal Kcka Mskaya Dxral. Ri-s Poso tyawmo: Rikisi Tohonac Afrika. Mcbiyaw balay socyeyn kawkoswey Tohonac Afrika o niqan doma qnlangan babaw dxral knrodan balay kawko mi hwaso ssdiq hniti toqar cbiyaw balay. Kawko sweycya o wada kndadax Hawtng Sng kcka knkingal bling sndiyal smko knoo bay hwaso mi boc ssdiq cbiyaw. Pnsliyan Cyawkwen UN o wada dha ngalan Jaysang Hniti Qnlangan Tohonac Afrika ori, splawa 'Poso Pnyahan Ssediq'. Kngkawas 1924, Raymond Dart o mniq Toiwil Daya Sng kingal alang Taong sndiyal to1 hwaso ssediq- Laqi Taong. Ya bay kndadax brah kongweyn 500 kngkawas cida, sediq San mniq Afrika tohonac phiyo knkana omadok lmamo mi spoda qqpahan tmabo tnbowan ka poso ooda keyjay. Dsediq San niyi so ka sediq mptabo tnbowan niya pa splawa dha 'Sediq Khoikhoi' (Dongos niya o 'Ssediq'), kiya o kcka tnposo mniq tndxral hiya o splawa dha 'Sediq Boshmen' (Dongos niya ka 'Sediq Lmiqo'). Spoda qnbsyaqan bay mstorong mi pnspowan dara daw, ddha minjoko niyi o wada msediq Khoisan. Konghkwo Kngkkawas 1960 prading, doma qnlhangan o prading tbrinah ini srowa pnwaya psanak minjoko Tohonac Afrika, binaw alaw moda pnwaya psanak mnjoko ka Tohonac Afrika, kiya ka mnoda 'Snklwiyan Pnskraya Keyjay'. Kiya o mniq kngkkawas 1960 dhoq kngkkawas 1970 jiday, malo moda pnsong qnlangan cida wada ini biyaw mrana na Nihong, wada dha splawa sa 'Knbeyhing Sediq Keyjay Afrika'. Dhoq kngkkawas 1980 jiday, knbeyhing balay hmtor ooda o beytaq pkrana dhiq Pchowan Kwoci mi wada malax toco ka qnlhangan icil, kiya ka wada dndolan ka keyjay Tohonac Afrika. Mangosotho Gatsha Bothelezi mi Hari Schwarz mniq kngkawas 1974 pbatas pnsdhowan "Pnkla Kari Snhiyan Mahrabatini", snbeyhing qori psblayaq rinji moda biyax mi mntna kana ka txtaxa sediq ka poso niya, kiya Tohonac Afrika mpdodol dha qalox sediq mi bhoway sediq mowaya bay tomn1 wada mnhdo pbatas qori pnsdhowan niyi. Kngkawas 1989 cida Frederik Willem de Klerk ka psdhowan phiyo soto qnlhangan, wada plaxan ka pnwaya psanak minjoko kiya mi pdodol dokorici ka Toiwil honac Afrika. Kngkawas 1990 idas 2 diyax 9, Namibia o wada pbatas psdho keyngpo dha mi snpeyyah qnlhangan Tohonac Afrika dokorico. Mntna kngkawas cida, wada pkla kari ka Tohonac Afrika sliqon dha ka howoko dha, kiya mi tomal "Patas PnsdhowanUxay Pkrana Howoci". Kngkawas 1994 idas 3 diyax 1, Tohonac Afrika o wada dha sobway Namibia ka Ppanan Aso Walvis mi Pengoin Cyontaw. Idas 4, Tohonac Afrika o mowaya bay mntxan moda Ini psanak minjoko seyngkyo, oxay wana niyi, Tohonac Afrika o wada snborah tomal Ta Ing kwoswey Dongan, kiya mi wada mtomal mnTohonac Afrika Pkrana Kongtongti. Ti-ri Poso tyawmo: Lnlingay dxral Tohonac Afrika. Joga dxral o pntora Tohonac Afrika poso balay nniqan lnlingay dxral dha. Mqalox kndox seyng ka kndadax pnspowan Tobeyhing Doras tokcka tobaraw brnox tnayos, Tobeyhing Doras tobaraw dodox balay o dhoq hmrinas 3,000m. Tonarac mbanah seyng ka Todo Dwiyaq Drakensberg,todo dwiyaq niyi o kiya ka wada mtnayos Kwa Zolo-Natal Sng mi Lesotho. Uxay wana kato doras mi todo ddwiyaq ka wada ptora bay tnayos, msngari mlngo bnatas ka dxral pa oka mndongos bay pnsnakan ayos. Kcka doma klaon dxral o niqan rncohan rakaw, doma dxral o wana spoda hangan dha moda pkla. Tohonac Afrika o wa mniq tohonac hongon balay Afrika, mkngaho ocilong seyng o moro tohonac Tasiyang mi tohonac Ucilong India lmotoc hmrinas 2,500km, kiya mi dxral qnlhangan o dhoq 1,219,912 pinghwang km. Spoda "Patas Kngkawas Knhbrawan Hiyi Sediq UN", tnbkowan qnlangan to24 knbeyhing qnlhangan ka Tohonac Afrika. Kngkarac Tohonac Afrika o Mtilox Sspriq Brnox Kngkarac ka poso. Tasiyang mi Ucilong India psanak kndadax tonarac, tohonac, toiwil to3 pnyahan mtqiri Tohonac Afrika, hniqan dxral o todaya ka baraw mi tohonac ka troma, kngkarac o kndadax toiwil daya ka Nanobi Bnaqi Bboyo, tohonac ka Mtilox Balay Kndngowan Dmka Kndngowan Kngkarac dhoq tonarac ka Mtilox Hari Kngkarac. Misan o mniq kawas kawas idas 6 dhoq idas 8. Sngwo Twoyangsing. Tohonac Afrika mniq kngkawas 1994 idas 6 diyax 4 pbatas pnsdhowan "Pnsdhowan Sngwo twoyangsing", wada pwaya mndongos patas pnsdhowan Qnlhangan Sngwo Twoyangsing Canrwey mi Singtong Keykako. Mniq qnlangan o 17 ka kcka Cawci Sngwo Twoyangsing Qnlhangan Tongmong, tnbkowan to6 ka Tohonac Afrika. Ccamac Kiya ka knkana rayong Transva, lqlic Afrika, lqlic Tohonac Afrika, bhoway sinyo tohonac, dapa dmay tokarac orong, miric nyeyncyaw, miric heypan, holing bboyo, homa, kiya mi bbaraw waro rqnox Tohonac Afrika ori mi oo bay ponoh ccamac o malo qtan mniq kcka kwanmocong spriq. Kiya mi Tohonac Afrika o niqan oo bay tokobeyco klowan ccamac lmiqo, kcka o kiya ka knkana mniq nniqan Karoo oxay biyaw mpoka ka osagey Tohonac Afrika. Cyonrey Dhoq kngkawas 1945, Tohonac Afrika o wada hmrinas 4,900 klowan bntasan ka cncyon (kiya ka knkana wada mnLokos Dxral na klowan ori). Kngkawas 2006 cida, Tohonac Afrika o ya bay niqan 20 knbkiyan cncyon (ini spowi ka mnsdan modos kowi niya); spoda snpowan dha matas, knoo cncyon Tohonac Afrika o rmabang knoo qqhoni mi pphpah. Qqhoni mi pphpah Qqhoni mi pphpah twoyangsing Tohonac Afrika o kari bay mi mndongos balay, niqan hmrinas 22,000 klowanan ini pntna kawtng qqhoni mi pphpah, kiya ka kana qnlangan knklan klowanan qqhoni mi pphpah ya bay 9%. Qtan bay sngwo cyonrwo ka sspriq brnox, kcka hini poso bay o niqan rcya king hohwan mi qhoni payco. Qori so pawyo Mniq coxal 40 kngkawas, wada oka ka knbeyhing bay dxral cisi ida nkiya Tohonac Afrika, poso balay ka 19 th cida scoqi hbaraw ka sediq, mrana ka alang mkbrnox mi kmoroc qhoni lmiqo. Kiya ori o niqan oo bay ka klowanan pneyyah qnlhangan icil (Mray so qhoni qalox cing, maingta kiya mi phpah tokarac ing) qori so tndxral sngwo twoyangsing o wada knbeyhing bay snrdingan niya. Cng-c mi Cng-fo Poso tyawmo: Seyho Tohonac Afrika, seyji Tohonac Afrika, horico Tohonac Afrika mi biyax sediq Thonac Afrika. Pnsliyan Seyho Tohonac Afrika ka Gikay Konghkwo, binaw tohoy qori so konghkwo niyi o ini pntna, soto ka qnlhangan weynso mi poso tonox mpdodol seyho ori. Diyax iyax qpahon soto o 5 kngkawas, malo mn2 mangal qpahon soto. Soto o malo dmoron phiyo hoko soto mi knkingal bo bbocyo, kiya mi bocyo mi knkingal dnodol niya pomn ka moda pssli Neyko. Kokomin Gikay o malo moda ini snhiyi tongyi moda tanho soto mi neyko. Singcng, phiyo waya mi sohwa o to bay sqlhangan mdakar keyngpo kana, nasi smliq waya keyngpo, sangci hoing o niqan biyax hmtor singcng cikwan mi ndan gikay. Horico Soweto o pskoraw kngkawas 2012 tomal na sediq o kangyi smqori ptolok qridin tongsingryeynco. Tohonac Afrika o niqan mdho bay qmlahang waya biyax sediq, binaw ida niqan doma cyonti ka thqilan dha mita. Tohonac Afrika ka Afrika to1 smrowa tongsing mstorong niya qnlhangan. "Keyngpo Tohonac Afrika" ka Tohonac Afrika tobaraw bay horico, waya niyi ka nniqan konghkwo pndongos lxanan horico, pwaya biyax mi qpahon kongmin, kiya mi moda mko psanak ddaon seyho. Pnloban waycyaw Kngkawas 1948 dhoq kngkawas 1990 jiday prading, bhoway seyho Tohonac Afrika o moda pnwaya psanak minjoko, so kiya wada danan hmtor mi sthiyaq balay syakay qnlangan. Cida, wada balay so tnqliyan morox nanaq ka hnyowan niya qnlangan, wana doma dxral qnlhangan todaya bhoway sedoq cngcweyn ka niqan pnloban dha. Kngkawas 1998 idas 1 diyax 1, Tohonac Afrika o wada pstoq pnloban waycyaw Cyoka Minkoko, kiya mi mndongos bay phiyo pnloban waycyaw Cyoka Jnmin Konghkwo, kiya ka thiti bay tohoy Cyoka Monkoko pstoq waycyaw na poso pangcyaw qnlhangan. Ana so kiya,Tohonac Afrika o ida mniq Taiwan phiyo dayhyoco, kiya ka ini khbaraw tohoy Cyoka Minkoko pwalok malo pnloban oxay seyho wacyaw pnloban na qnlhangan Afrika ori. Singcng cyohwa Cing-ci Poso tyawmo: Keyjay Tohonac Afrika. Tohonac Afrika o moda prrimax keyjay, kiya ka psnol Nigeria na to2 keyjayti Afrika, binaw balay bay pa qori so smnalo dha lxanan o knmalo balay pnkrana niya. Pspon pnsong qnlhangan icil, Tohonac Afrika jncyon kcka qnlhangan sngcan mawo o tobaraw bay ori, binaw knbeyhing bay snthyaqan ori ka sediq snblayaq mi sediq mqraqil. Ana so wada mnhdo ka pnwaya pnsanak minjoko, binaw Tohonac Afrika saya o ida sntorong tobaraw bay mqrinoc ryo mi oka qpahon ryo. Qori Keyjay dha. Ini pntna qnlangan kayhwacong qnlhangan mi hbaraw bay qnlhangan Afrika ka Tohonac Afrika, ini so kkrana ka oxay so mndongos bay keyjay ka Tohonac Afrika.Kngkawas 1994, borah seyho Tohonac Afrika o mbiyax bay phlih tonghwo pongcang, sndho kongkong caycng, kiya mi mhoc doma wayco, binaw knkrana keyjay o ida ini pndongos. Kndadax kngkawas 2004 prading, wada ptora bay mrana ka keyjay niya Tohonac Afrika, kiya ori pa Tohonac Afrika o koxol balay yahan sdhmaon rmiwaw. Knkana nngalan dha pila o mabang oo bay ka pneyyah qqpahan rmiwaw, so kawas ka Tohonac Afrika knrana ryo GDP ka 5.1%, kngkawas 2006 daw 5.0%. Tohonac Afrika pa mnkcka baraw nngalan niya Kayhwacong Qnlhangan, kiya ka doma qnlhangan Afrika, poso balay kwoci mawyi tomodaci dha pa Doico, Amirika, Cyoka Jnmin Konghkwo, Nihong, Ingkoko mi Spain. Pnwaya dha ddiyon pila ka pila Tohonac Afrika. Kngkawas 2013 idas 8, "fDi Caco" o spoda Tohonac Afrika mkbiyax keyjay, nniqan lnlingay mpqpah, ssliqon mi nngalan, lxanan smmlon, ddangi ploban qmpah mi waysang msdyrox toco, kiya ka wada dha srngaw mndongos bay qnlhangan Afrika ka Tohonac Afrika. Cinjong pawmi coso o wada ptbkowan knkana qnlangan to50 knanjey bay qdriqan jeyking tnlangan baraw. To1 qqpahan pnyahan Mniq 18 th cida, Tohonac Afrika o wada madas klowanan Mirino na miric rodo obal, kiya ka prading knoo bay hnranan dha obal miric. 20 th brah cida, keyjay Tohonac Afrika o mnsntama balay qqpahan tmabo tnbowan ka poso balay han, poso balay ka tmabo miric. Ubal miric cokoco Tohonac Afrika o to2, tnhiti qori king kwang. Alaw rngedi coco ka miyah smliq, ini koo ka tmabo dapa, kiya ori o, poso balay pnyahan nasi ro ori ka Tohonac Afrika. To2 qqpahan pnyahan Qqpahan xxiloy ka rolo, kikay ori mchdil kongyey na lxanan niya. Mchdil kongyey Tohonac Afrika ka smmalo kikay, tonox kisya, kikay nojyo, aso kiya mi ssalo rolo ka poso niya. Tohonac Afrika ka morox bay Afrika sntama biyax honeng phdeyngki na qnlhangan, wa mniq CapeTown phiyo Afrika Talo morox bay hotyeyncan. To3 qqpahan pnyahan Mniq qori qqpahan pnyahan, kndadax 1990 kngkawas pnrdingan, poso balay dndolan mrana keyjay Tohonac Afrika ka to3 qqpahan pnyahan, tokobeyco niya o kiya ka qqpahan ginghang, qqpahan cingjong, qqpahan rrmiwaw mi qqpahan ppanan skoki, smqori so GDP o niqan knbeyhing bay qnepah niya, kcka na o, qqpahan howo ka poso to3 qqpahan pnyahan Tohonac Afrika, kiya ka knkana hmrinas Tohonac Afrika GDP 67%. Lxanan smlowan mi ppanan sediq mi qqiya Mniq Tohonac Afrika pa, ppanan sediq mi qqiya o kiya ka ddaon planon balay moda kiya, kiya ka moda pkrana MyCiTi niya poso ori. MyCiTi ka 1 baso cyeyyon sitong, spoda smrowa mi ptrawah knslxan bay ppanan sitong miyah dmayaw ooda ppanan rolo Cape Town. Mniq kngkawas 2014, knkana qnlhangan Tohonac Afrika knkingal sediq pnpanan skoki o hmrinas mn3,500 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, tnbkowan mtbiyax bay ppanan skoki o Oliver Tambo Kwoci Ppanan Skoki, Cape Town Kwoci Ppanan Skoki, King Shaka Kwoci Ppanan Skoki, Elizabeth Trdowan Aso Ppanan Skoki mi Tohnranan Didaw London Ppanan Skoki. Biyax rawtong socang. Tohonac Afrika na Dmayaw Qalox Sediq Cngco mi Mdho Bay Moda Cngco o wada pkrana keyjay qnbliqan qalox sediq, kiya mi niqan ka kcka tnbarah qalox sediq congcan cyeyci ori. Kiya o knkana biyax dnowi qnlhangan mi pddayak, qori so pnwaya mdakar rawkong o kiya ka wada krinah mrana ka ooda oka qpahon. Snborah Koyeyn. Doma poso balay koswey mi ciso pkrana o snpeyyah Tohonac Afrika kana: Kngkawas 1967 idas 12 diyax 3, spoda Grotschol byoing sinjyo wayko ising Christiaan Banard pa wada pndongos bay moda knkana qnlangan mowaya balay Moda Pkoroc Thdil Sinjyo; Max Theiler ka snmalo 1 Iyo Mdakar Mcayis Mitilox Narox; Allan Macleod Cormack ka snmalo X Seseyng Smpoci Twancng Sawmyaw; Aaron Klog ka snmalo Cintiswey Tyeynco Syeynweycing ciso. Wana Banard ising ka oka, kana hangan baraw niyi pa mnangal Snado Nobel kana, kiya ka wada pkrana knoo bay mnangal Snado Nobel na qnlhangan Afrika. Kngkawas 2002, Sydney Brenner pa alaw mniq qori so snmalo qpahon honco sngwoswey kiya ka wada mangal Snado Nobel. Pndongos qsiya mi weysng Tohonac Afrika Qori Qsiya Pomn na 2 ptora tokobeyco ka mtrawah lxanan dmowi qsiya cngco mi ori Qsiya Yingkay ka pniqan dha. Kngkawas 2014 idas 5, Delban o alaw 'Pyeynksing mi Pawjongsing Hoho' wada mangal Snado Stockholm Kongyey Qsiya, kiya ka splawa dha 'Knkana Qnlangan Knklaman Bay Kongyong Qqpahan Uri' ka pomn niyi, kiya ka mowaya bay pqori sediq mqrinoc pndongos ini angal pila ddiyon lxanan qsiya niya Coco So. Jen-ko Poso tyawmo: Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Tohonac Afrika. Knhbrawan mi Bnkowan Tohonac Afrika ka 1 niqan ya bay 5,962 knbkiyan (Kngkawas 2020) snpeyyah ini pntna pnyahan, bongka, kari mi snlhayan snhiyan knhbrawan hiyi sediq na qnlhangan. Kndadax qnhdowan pnwaya psanak minjoko ka Tohonac Afrika daw, doma bhoway sediq pa kndodol mlatac Tohonac Afrika, kngkawas 1980 daw wada mlih dhoq 16%. Kari Tohonac Afrika o niqan 11 klowanan kari ddiyon seyho. Spoda kngkawas 2011 snpowan knhbrawan hiyi sediq, srngaw dha balay to1 kari ka kari Zolo (22.7%), spron bay snrno pa kari Ingkoko o wana balay tnbkowan to4, binaw kari Ingkoko ka poso balay kari srngaw dha qori mniq seyji, mniq mbbari mi cwanmey. Knoo balay bhoway sediq Tohonac Afrika o rmngaw kari O Co, kiya ka kari Bodoya, kari Doico mi kari Hellas, niqan doma llotoc Asia sediq Tohonac Afrika o rmngaw kari Asia ori. Qori so mniq Tohonac Afrika na Afrika France Cweyn Qnlhangan sediq tnhdilan pa rmngaw kari Afrika France kiya. Alang Mkbrnox Ini knbaka ka nniqan sapah mi ini ttoko kalxanan smnalo ka dxral nniqan alang mkbrnox poso niya ooda ori. So kiya, alang mkbrnox ssiyaw dxral nniqan tokobeyco niya ka oxay mndongos bay smnalo ssapah, mray so beywi, nniqan mqrinoc sediq ori. Nniqan hbaraw qalox sediq na Alang Mkbrnox Hwa cincng mniq 21 th pnrdingan lmotoc, smatang knhbrawan sediq nongcwen o mosa mlih 5% dhoq 10%. Snlhayan s Spoda kngkawas 2001 snpowan knhbrawan Tohonac Afrika, snlhayan Kiristo kyo ka knhbrawan hoyi sediq 79% Tohonac Afrika, kcka niya o to bay snlohay Borah Kiristo kyo, ini khbaraw ka Teyns kyo mi doma kyokay. Bongka Poso tyawmo: Bongka Tohonac Afrika. Tohonac Afrika qalox sediq pa to bay mpqpah pnwalang ka hbaraw bay, kiya mi ida wiso msmay bay mniq kcka mqrinoc alang mpqpah pnwalang, binaw nniqan dha hiya o kiya ka hmoroc mndongos bay pnsltodan bongka Tohonac Afrika. Binaw, wada hbaraw bay qalox sediq o prading Alang Mkbrnox Hwa mi Tomoqi Hidaw Hwa, pnsltodan bongka niyi o wiso kndodol oka. Tohonac Afrika Tongcyon ka Tohonac Afrika mowaya bay pnqori knkana qnlhangan kana klowan joko mbbiyax mi rodan sediq ptrawah 1 pssliyan mbbiyax ori. Yiso Tohonac Afrika na yisopin pa kiya ka knkanna doma kncka qnlangan kncbiyaw bayyisopin, mniq brah kongweyn 10000 kngkawas, miyah thdil Tohonac Afrika ka Sediq Khoi San o prading ndhiya nanaq tokobeyco bongka mi yiso- Joga Qnabil Bling Btasil. Meyti mi ryosing bongka. Tohonac Afrika o niqan knbeyhing bay qqpahon cwanmey, kiya ka Afrika poso balay cwanmey congsin ori. Poso balay srngaw dha kari ka kari Ingkoko. Mmahan mo ooqan Damac mi mmahan mi ooqan bongka Tohonac Afrika o to bay qori hiyi ka lxanan, sediq tndxral o splawa dha 'Braai (Dongos niya ndohan hiyi oxay daw modoh). Saya, kiya ori o Tohonac Afrika saya o wada mkrana dhoq poso balay pnyahan sinaw lipas qnlhangan ori, kiya mi niqan balay hnhangan knkana qnlangan. Tiyo Wa mbiyax Kngkawas 2007 Qnlhangan Pey Pnsong Boro Kandang daw, Miric Storing Toy o tomal baso mraka rmiwaw. Koxol balay mi sdhmaon balay tiyo ondo Tohonac Afrika ka mtor boro, boro kandang mi pancyo. Mnoda copan mi wada mbiyax Ici bang Kngkawas 1995 Qnlangan Pey Pnsong Boro Kandang, kiya mi mniq France mbiyax Kngkawas 2007 Qnlangan Pey Pnsong Boro Kandang. So kawas o wada copan Qnlhangan Afrika Pey, kiya mi qnlhangan toy o wada mbiyax Dongan. Tohonac Afrika mniq pnsong beyhing kwoci ondokay dha na tnbkowan: · Rbawan Olympic Undokay: 26King 31Ging 29Dong 86 ka snado ( Tohonac Afrika to2, qnlangan to32). · Misan Olympic Undokay: 0King 0Ging 0Dong 0 ka snado ( Uka hnhangan). · Qnlangan Undokay: 6King 11Ging 18Dong 35 ka snado ( Tohonac Afrika to2, qnlangan to35. · Rbawan Tobeyhing Undokay: 27King 21Ging 28Dong 76 ka snado ( Tohonac Afrika to1, qnlangan to27). · Misan Tobeyhing Undokay: 0King 0Ging 0Dong 0 ka snado ( Uka hnhangan). · Qnlangan Upo Undokay: 2King 1Ging 8Dong 11 ka snado ( Tohonac Afrika to2, qnlangan to26). · Rbawan Mbbiyax Olympic Undokay: 6King 5Ging 4Dong 15 ka snado ( Tohonac Afrika to4, qnlangan to27). · Misan Mbbiyax Olympic Undokay: 0King 0Ging 0Dong 0 ka snado ( Uka hnhangan). Pnskraya Qnlhangan Diyax smsong sngayan節日 Toborah balay smsong sngayan mi diyax kineyng knkana qnlhanga Tohonac Afrika ka trahoc niyi: : Kyoiko Poso tyawmo: Kyoiko Tohonac Afrika. Tohonac Afrika pa alaw mnqnlhangan Ingkoko, kiya ka mniq lxanan kyoiko ka Ingso Kyoiko, kiya mi ririh sa mntna balay Ingkoko. Alaw Tohonac Afrika o mnmoda pnwaya psanak minjoko cngco, coxal balay ka qalox sediq pa oka brahan mangal biyax moda kyoiko, pyasan tobeyhing o to bay bhoway sediq kana ka pnhiyo niya, dhoq malax pnwaya psanak minjoko daw, qalox sediq o hana niqan pnsdkanan biyax moda kyoiko. Pqita narox weysng. Poso tyawmo: Pqita narox weysng mi Pqita narox qmlahang hiyi. Spoda bnatas smpo Tohonac Afrika Pnloban Minjoko Keykyoso, kngkawas 2009 bhoway sediq yoci knodos ka 71 kngkawas, kiya miqalox sediq ka 48 kngkawas. Wana 16% sediq Tohonac Afrika ka ndwanan qmlahang Keykako Pqita Narox, qori so msngari kana sediq daw kasi ka dmowi pila dha nanaq oxay daw spoda byoing dmowi pila keykako moway. Tohonac Afrika ka nniqan qnlangan to3 knbeyhing byoing Chris Hani Baragwanath Byoing. Ssediq Tohonac Afrika ka knkana qnlangan knoo bay sediq ronan Narox Ayco na qnlhangan. Spoda pnkla kari UN Narox Ayco Ryeynho Koyhwaso, Tohonac Afrika pa ya bay niqan 700 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ronan Narox Ayco. Uoda Narox Ayco Tohonac Afrika o hidoyi balay, mniq kngkawas 2013 cida o ya bay niqan 560 knbkiyan hiyi sediq (Hmrinas knkana hiyi sediq 10% Tohonac Afrika) wada ronan Narox Ayco. Brah soto Thabo Mvoyelwa Mbeki mi ngalan weysng bocyo ka Manto Tshabalala-Msimang ka bsiyaq balay hmtor kari ooda qori monday Tohonac Afrika Narox Ayco, dhiya o mdho bay kari dha poso hnqilan dha o alaw ini pndongos eyyo mi mqrinoc ka kiya. Mniq babaw kngkawas 2009 tobeyhing seyngkyo daw, seyho o prading pkrana pila pkrbangan nniqan moda pkmalo naro ayco. Dhoq kngkawas 2015 cida, seyho o pndongos mhnok thiyi iyo, kiya ka wada kndadax 52.1 kngkawas ka yoci knodos pkranan dhoq 62.5 kngkawas. Pnyahan pnatas CIA 外交部 Tnhjil kari seejiq Watan Diro mtabog.
